meanings.definition: A person who engages in bartering goods or services with others.
meanings.sent1: The barterers exchanged their vegetables for fresh eggs.
meanings.sent2: The local barterers traded tools for clothing at the market.
meanings.sent3: The barterers had a funny mix-up and ended up swapping pets instead of furniture.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, successful barterers are like skilled negotiators.
meanings.sent5: The group of barterers gathered around, haggling and swapping items enthusiastically.
